name: R.I. DEPT. OF MENTAL HEALTH RETARDATION AND HOSPITALS v. John DOE
name_abbreviation: R.I. Dept. of Mental Health Retardation & Hospitals v. Doe

parties: R.I. DEPT. OF MENTAL HEALTH RETARDATION AND HOSPITALS v. John DOE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted. The judgment of the District Court is stayed until further order of this court.
MURRAY, J., did not participate.

casebody.head_matter:
R.I. DEPT. OF MENTAL HEALTH RETARDATION AND HOSPITALS v. John DOE.
No. 86-302-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
July 17, 1986.
